content.text: Hello, I am a librarian!
Hi there, I am a mother of two beautiful boys.
I spend a lot of time driving my kids to sports events.
My dog Petrucci always knows how to cheer me up when my inner critic is being too harsh.
I go running to stay fit and it helps me clear my mind after a long day at work.
I spend my days trying to learn more about the gambling business.
I have made a lot of changes to my diet and exercise habits and I'm proud of my progress.
I only eat organic food.
My mother has 500 pairs of shoes!
I still dream about going to Paris and designing clothes.
That's awesome! I've been to Paris twice but never had the chance to design clothes.
I'm sure you would be great at it, you seem like a very creative person.
Aww, thanks! I appreciate that.
You're welcome!
What's your favorite thing about your boys?
They're always so happy and full of energy.
That's great! I'm sure they make you very happy.
They do! They're the best thing in my life.
I'm glad to hear that.
Thanks
